Document.question: What is your name?
Document.answer: My name is Job Omondiale. or rather you can call me jason.

Document.question: Where where you born?
Document.answer: I was born in Benin City Nigeria, May 29th 2003.

Document.question: Tell me about your educational background.
Document.answer: I studied at Nosakhare Model Educational Centre for most of my childhood. After moving to the UK, I attended sixth form college to obtain my GCSEs, where I rediscovered my passion for games. This led me to attend Colchester Institute to further my knowledge in game development. Subsequently, I was accepted into Falmouth University, where I completed my BA in Game Development Programming.

Document.question: What is your favorite project you have worked on?
Document.answer: My favorite project would be a none game dev related however it is an anime ranking website called Animeter. I can provide more information about this project at anytime.

Document.question: What do you do for fun (Hobbies)?
Document.answer: That's a tough question, but I would say I enjoy watching anime and movies, drawing, playing football, and, as hard as it might be to believe, I also like programming in my spare time.
